name: Ascendant (itch) (Savvy, eh?, onyxpixels)
description:
The afternoon promised a relaxing time of tea and meditation, but the storm had other plans!

Play as Yasha, a young ninja girl fighting for survival as a violent storm rips up the world around her. Use your deft ninja skills to jump, dive and climb your way up through cascading debris, all while landing on as many rocks as possible to achieve a high score! And who knows, your destiny may await in the eye of the storm...

The game may take a moment to load before the first play.

Controls
Arrow keys - Move
Z - Jump/Wall jump
X/down - Divekick

Programming
Onyx Davidson

Art
Xavier Davidson

Additional Art

Playtesting
